author: Al Jazeera
description: Michel Temer's office immediately denies reported allegation that he authorised hush-money payment to jailed politician.
title: Michel Temer 'taped approving Eduardo Cunha bribe'

author: BBC News
description: Hundreds of people gathered in the city calling for the impeachment of President Michel Temer.
title: Drums and chanting at Sao Paulo anti-Temer protest

description: Staatspräsident Michel Temer soll persönlich dabei mitgewirkt haben, einen gefährlichen Mitwisser in einem Korruptionsfall zum Schweigen zu bringen. Die Proteste gegen Temer nehmen zu, Brasiliens Börsenkurse fallen.
title: Korruptionsvorwürfe: Temer-Skandal belastet Brasiliens Börse

author: Spiegel Online
description: Brasiliens Präsident Michel Temer gerät unter Druck: Weil er Schweigegeld-Zahlungen an einen Ex-Politiker zugestimmt haben soll, ermittelt das Oberste Gericht Ermittlungen. Temer lehnt einen Rücktritt ab.
title: Brasilien: Oberstes Gericht genehmigt Ermittlungen gegen Präsident Temer

author: Anthony Boadle and Ricardo Brito
description: Brazil's President Michel Temer on Thursday defiantly said he would not resign from office despite a Supreme Court decision authorizing an investigation into allegations he condoned bribery of a potential witness in a major corruption probe.
title: Brazil's Temer refuses to resign in face of investigation

author: PETER PRENGAMAN and MAURICIO SAVARESE
description: RIO DE JANEIRO (AP) — Brazilian President Michel Temer on Thursday rejected calls for his resignation, saying he will fight allegations that he endorsed the paying of hush money to an ex-lawmaker jailed for corruption. The embattled leader spoke in a national address after Globo newspaper reported Wednesday night that Temer was recorded supporting payments to former Lower House Speaker Eduardo Cunha. The incendiary accusation was the latest development in a scandal that has had Latin America's largest nation on edge the last 24 hours with its stock market and currency plunging, and rumors circulating that Temer would step down.
title: Brazil's Temer: 'I won't resign' amid corruption allegations

description: Im brasilianischen Petrobras-Skandal belasten Tonaufnahmen Präsident Temer. Er soll der Zahlung von Schweigegeld an einen früheren Vertrauten zugestimmt haben.
title: Brasilien: Präsident Temer soll Schmiergeldzahlungen gebilligt haben

author: Elena Holodny
description: Brazilian newspaper O Globo reported that there is a recording of President Michel Temer approving a payment to jailed former house speaker Eduardo Cunha.
title: Brazilian markets are getting rocked amid another growing political scandal

author: Lisandra Paraguassu and Ricardo Brito, Reuters
description: Brazilian President Michel Temer reportedly gave his blessing to an attempt to pay a potential witness in the country's biggest-ever graft investigation.
title: Report says Brazil's president is on tape discussing hush money

author: Mario Sergio Lima, Bruce Douglas, Matthew Malinowski
description: Brazil’s President Michel Temer has defied calls for him to step down, saying a Supreme Court probe will debunk allegations he participated in a cover-up.
title: Brazil Sinks Deeper Into Political Crisis
